profileEnricher.uploadLabel: Upload CV/Resume or LinkedIn Profile URL
profileEnricher.uploadPlaceholder: Paste LinkedIn URL or click Upload
profileEnricher.uploadHelpText: AI will read the document to help complete your profile.
profileEnricher.validatorMessage: Did you mean Data Analytics (SKL-045)? Using standard codes helps keep our data consistent.
profileEnricher.aiInsightsText: Based on resume analysis, Somchai shows strong potential for an Area Sales Manager role with targeted development in leadership and strategic planning.
profileEnricher.uploadOrEnrich: Upload CV or use AI Enricher
profileEnricher.reqMasterLists: Master lists of job codes & skills
profileEnricher.painPointText: Manual profile entry leads to incomplete, inconsistent, or poorly coded data (e.g., skills, job titles), making reporting and analysis difficult.
profileEnricher.aiSolutionPoint1: Profile Enricher (LLM): Reads uploaded CVs/resumes or LinkedIn profiles (handling Thai & English) to automatically extract and fill fields like total experience, skills, activities, and religion.
profileEnricher.aiSolutionPoint2: Validator Bot: When users manually enter data (like skills or job titles), the AI checks against the company's standard codes (taxonomy). If it finds a likely mismatch or an unknown term, it suggests the closest official code in a pop-up.
profileEnricher.exampleScenarioText: A new hire uploads their CV. The AI pre-fills ~90% of their profile fields. They manually type "data scientist" as a skill; the Validator Bot suggests the official code "Data Scientist (JT-123)".
profileEnricher.benefitTime: Saves Time: Drastically reduces manual data entry for employees and HR.
profileEnricher.benefitQuality: Improves Data Quality: Ensures profiles are more complete and use standardized codes.
profileEnricher.benefitAnalytics: Enables Better Analytics: Provides clean, rich data foundation for subsequent AI features like skill gap analysis and matching.
profileEnricher.benefitCleanup: Reduces HR Clean-up: Minimizes the need for manual correction of inconsistent data.

skillGap.legendModerateTooltip: Moderate gap that should be addressed soon
skillGap.legendMinorTooltip: Minor or no gap; skills are aligned with requirements
skillGap.departmentViewSubTitle: Comparing current team skills against requirements for Area Sales Manager.
skillGap.gapHoverInstruction: Hover over gap status for details and recommendations.
skillGap.readinessSubTitle: Potential successors for Area Sales Manager with attrition risk assessment.
skillGap.individualViewSubTitle: Select an employee to view their personal skill gaps
skillGap.aiInsightText: High potential (85% Readiness) for Area Sales Manager role, but significant Negotiation gap (-3.0) requires urgent attention. High flight risk (75%) necessitates immediate retention focus.
skillGap.timelineEvent1Desc: Completed the 6-week leadership program with certification
skillGap.timelineEvent2Desc: 4 sessions completed out of 8 total sessions
skillGap.timelineEvent3Desc: 2-day intensive negotiation skills bootcamp to address critical gap
skillGap.strategicViewStatReadinessDesc: Sales team readiness for strategic goals (vs last Q)
skillGap.strategicViewStatGapsDesc: Critical gaps across department (vs last Q)
skillGap.strategicViewDistSubTitle: Focus on skills critical for Q3 strategic goals.
skillGap.strategicViewRec1Desc: 30% of sales team members are below standard (Gap: -3.0 avg) in negotiation, directly impacting close rates. AI identifies this as the highest impact area for training investment.
skillGap.strategicViewRec1Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Implement targeted workshops, prioritizing Key Account Managers first due to direct revenue impact.
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Title: Mitigate Retention Risk for Key Talent
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Desc: AI predicts high flight risk (75%) for Anucha P. (Ready Now successor) and medium risk (55%) for Pichai R. (Needs Development). Loss impacts succession pipeline for Area Sales Manager.
skillGap.strategicViewRec2Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Initiate immediate retention talks with Anucha P. (compensation review, career pathing). Develop accelerated plan for Pichai R. focused on Strategic Planning.
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Title: Leverage Leadership Strengths for Peer Development
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Desc: 60% of team shows proficiency in leadership skills. AI identifies potential mentors like Supaporn K. (Ready Now, Low Risk).
skillGap.strategicViewRec3Suggestion: AI Suggestion: Implement a peer mentoring program pairing proficient leaders with those 'Developing' (30%) to accelerate skill uplift efficiently.
skillGap.explanationBoxPainPointText: HR and managers lack a clear, forward-looking view of talent readiness and potential attrition. Identifying skill gaps across teams is often manual and time-consuming. Executives need quick visibility into overall workforce skills.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution1: Skill-Gap Analyzer: Compares current skills (from enriched profiles) against target role requirements to automatically identify and highlight gaps.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution2: Skills Heat-Map: Aggregates skill data across business units or departments, visualizing strengths and weaknesses (Red/Yellow/Green) for quick executive overview.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution3: Readiness & Flight-Risk Predictor: Analyzes a combination of data (performance reviews, skill levels, engagement surveys, tenure, market trends) to score an employee's readiness for a future role and predict their likelihood of leaving.
skillGap.explanationBoxAiSolution4: Auto-CDP Updater: Consolidates data from various sources (LMS, PMS, 360 feedback) into a single, unified Career Development Profile timeline for each employee, ensuring data for predictions is current.
skillGap.explanationBoxExampleText: A manager reviews the dashboard for their team. The heatmap instantly shows a critical gap in "Strategic Planning". The readiness table identifies two "Ready Now" successors for a key role, but flags one as a "High" flight risk, prompting immediate retention action.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit1: Proactive Succession Planning: Identify and develop future leaders based on data-driven readiness scores.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit2: Targeted Retention Efforts: Focus on high-potential employees identified as flight risks.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit3: Data-Driven L&D: Allocate training budgets effectively by focusing on the most critical, widespread skill gaps.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit4: Strategic Workforce Insights: Provide executives with clear visibility into the organization's overall skill health and talent pipeline.
skillGap.explanationBoxBenefit5: Real-time Data: Eliminates manual data consolidation, providing current insights.
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec1Desc: Addresses the most critical skill gap across the department
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec2Title: Schedule retention discussion with Anucha P.
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec2Desc: High flight risk for a "Ready Now" successor requires immediate attention
skillGap.explanationBoxAIRec3Desc: Could be ready sooner with targeted development in Strategic Planning
